## Data

* Ebola Data
    + [Source](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/ebola-cases-2014) - The Humanitarian Data Exchange       
    + [Data](https://github.com/halpo/R_Bootcamp_2020/raw/master/data/ebola-cases-and-deaths-who-gar-sitrep.xlsx)
    + [Script](https://github.com/halpo/R_Bootcamp_2020/tree/master/reading_ebola_data.R)
    + With world bank data -- [download](https://github.com/halpo/R_Bootcamp_2020/raw/master/data/our.data.RData)
* Bordeaux Wine Data
    + [Source](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-0-387-09608-7) - 
        Sheather, Simon. *A modern approach to regression with R.* Springer Science & Business Media, 2009.
    + [Data](https://github.com/halpo/R_Bootcamp_2020/raw/master/data/Bordeaux.csv)
    + [Script](https://github.com/halpo/R_Bootcamp_2020/tree/master/read_ing_ebola_data_bordeaux.R)
